section-1-council_food_key3: Community ke members ke beech kitchen aur baaki kaamo ko equally aur impartially distribute karna
section-1-council_food_key4: Meals ke breaks ka time decide karna
section-1-council_food_key5: Ye ensure karna ki break time me meals serve ho jaye
section-1-council_food_key6: Kitchen ki duty wale members ki help se khaane ka menu decide karna
section-1-council_food_key7: Grocery aur khaane ke liye baaki samaan khareedna aur khareedne ki responsibility ko distribute karna
section-1-council_food_key8: Community members ki khaane se related kisi bhi tareeke ki complaint ko address karna aur unhe resolve karna
section-1-council_food_key9: Kisi bhi aur kitchen aur food related issue ka solution
section-1-council_food_key10: Appropriate channels par aise sabhi decisions ko post karna
